name: Pumpkin Chipotle Fried Rice Instant pot
description: Smoky Vegan Pumpkin Chipotle Fried Rice made within minutes using the Instant Pot! A seasonal twist on restaurant-style fried rice your whole family will love! GF soyfree Nutfree, stove top option in notes
recipeIngredient: 3 cloves garlic (minced, or 1 tsp of garlic powder)
1/3 cup pumpkin puree (or mashed cooked pumpkin or butternut or other winter squash )
optional add ins: 3/4 cup veggie crumbles or 15oz can drained beans

recipeInstructions.text: Soak rice in hot water for at least 20 minutes. Wash and drain, and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak rice in hot water for at least 20 minutes. Wash and drain, and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Oil the bottom of the inner pot, then add in all of the ingredients, and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Oil the bottom of the inner pot, then add in all of the ingredients, and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Close the lid, and pressure cook for 5 minutes(high pressure, vent at sealing). Let the pressure release for 8 minutes, then quick release then open the lid. Fluff, taste and adjust flavor.
recipeInstructions.name: Close the lid, and pressure cook for 5 minutes(high pressure, vent at sealing). Let the pressure release for 8 minutes, then quick release then open the lid. Fluff, taste and adjust flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the rice to a serving container so it doesn’t continue to cook in the hot instant pot. top with garnishes of choice, and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer the rice to a serving container so it doesn’t continue to cook in the hot instant pot. top with garnishes of choice, and serve.

keywords: pumpkin fried rice, vegan fried rice recipe
